title: The burnynge of Paules church in London in the yeare of oure Lord 1561. and the iiii. day of Iune by lyghtnynge, at three of the clocke, at after noone, which continued terrible and helplesse vnto nyght
author: Pilkington, James, 1520?-1576.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Willyam Seres, dwellynge at the west ende of Powles, at the sygne of the Hedgehog,
